data.name: The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Sound Track


A collection of high quality, new full length music tracks not included with the original game. All tracks come in mp3 format.

TRACK LIST:
The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Track 1 - Length 4:00
The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Track 2 - Length 2:08
The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Track 3 - Length 3:10
The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Track 4 - Length 5:50
The Art of Knuckle Sandwich Track 5 - Length 3:58

FEATURES:
5 New High Quality Full Length Tracks
MP3 Format

After installing this DLC, a folder titled DLC Sound Track will appear in your The Art of Knuckle Sandwich app folder. This will contain the 5 High Quality Music Tracks.

data.short_description: A collection of high quality, new full length music tracks not included with the original game. All tracks come in mp3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Процессор: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
